Interface Transactional<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionCallback<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseTransactional
public interface Transactional<T>
extends org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionCallback<T>

Callback interface for transactional code. It adds support to execute some code after transaction commit

Author:
ameyer
See Also:
BaseTransactional

Method Summary
 T afterCommit(T result)
          This method will be invoked only if the transaction commits successfully.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.transaction.support.TransactionCallback
doInTransaction
 

Method Detail

afterCommit

T afterCommit(T result)
This method will be invoked only if the transaction commits successfully.

Parameters:
the - object returned by doInTransaction(...)
Returns:
the processed result after commit (or the received parameter if nothing to do)
